TopicTitle: Simple name changer setting for forum?

Articles.Content: So, there is a forum post were you can ask for a name change, but you can only do it once and i dont think i can trust them 100%. But if a name changing option on the forum is added (that allows you to change your name every 24 hours or so), i will be happy and i will change my name. Im not a master coder. Its just a suggestion from a boi wo does not know anything about making websites.
If they mess up your name I think they will correct it. I think the current method is fine, every 24 hours would be mayhem for a forum.

17 minutes ago, NSEP said:

you can only do it once and i dont think i can trust them 100%

These were the forum moderators you were talking to, look back on the thread and you'll notice that every request they initiated just fine unless they technically couldn't do it. Yes you can trust them around 99.99%. As for the one name change per user I believe it is to conserve usable usernames - You cannot rename yourself to a name that used to belong to someone else to avoid impersonation or identity theft.
